categories: Category:Starships of the Order of the Sith Lords

nodes.text: Darth Vader's green Eta-2 Actis-class interceptor
This green Eta-2 Actis-class interceptor was flown by the newly anointed Sith apprentice Darth Vader shortly before the end of the Clone Wars.

Darth Vader flew this green-painted starfighter from the Jedi Temple after Operation: Knightfall to Padmé Amidala's apartment, then to Mustafar to eliminate the Separatist leaders. Its fate afterward remains unknown.
